questions.question: What is the # topic used for?
answers: Is used as a wildcard for several levels
It is used as a wildcard for a single level
It is used to get only the top level
t is used to get only the bottom level

questions.question: What is QoS 1?
answers: At most once. The message can get lost, and there will be no attempts to resend it.
At least once. This means that the message will be eventually received, but that several copies of the message may appear due to duplication. The receiver has to detect any such duplicates.
Exactly once. This guarantees the delivery and avoids any duplication.
Never. The message will never be sent

questions.question: Which of these is not a part of MQTT?
answers: Broker
Publisher
Subscriber
Interceptor
